name: Lab Report By Department
query:
SELECT 
    c.lab__department AS "Test:Data:350",
    COUNT(c.lab_test) AS "No:Data:250"
FROM 
    `tabLab Sample` c
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabSample Collection` p ON c.parent = p.name
WHERE 
    p.date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s 
    AND p.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY 
    c.lab__department
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(c.lab_test) DESC; -- Assuming you want to sort by count in descending order
